LDN.description: Load D from memory location in register

LDA.description: Load D from memory location in register and Advance (increment) register

STR.description: Store D to memory location in register

LDX.description: Load D from memory location in X

LDXA.description: Load D from memory location in X and Advance (increment) X

STXD.description: Store D to memory location in X and Decrement X

AND.description: Set D to the logical AND of D and the memory location in X

OR.description: Set D to the logical OR of D and the memory location in X

XOR.description: Set D to the logical exclusive OR of D and the memory location in X

ANI.description: Set D to the logical AND of D and an Immediate value

ORI.description: Set D to the logical OR of D and an Immediate value

XRI.description: Set D to the logical exclusive OR of D and an Immediate value

ADD.description: Add D and the memory location in X

ADI.description: Add D and the Immediate value

ADC.description: Add D and the memory location in X with Carry (DF)

ADCI.description: Add D and the Immediate value with Carry (DF)

SD.description: Subtract D from the memory location in X

SDI.description: Subtract D from the Immediate value

SDB.description: Subtract D from the memory location in X with Borrow (NOT DF)

SDBI.description: Subtract D from the Immediate value with Borrow (NOT DF)

SM.description: Subtract the memory location in X from D

SMI.description: Subtract the Immediate value from D

SMB.description: Subtract the memory location in X with Borrow (NOT DF) from D

SMBI.description: Subtract the Immediate value with Borrow (NOT DF) from D

OUT.description: Output the memory location in X, and increment X

INP.description: Input into D and the memory location in X

GHI.description: Get High byte of register and load into D

GLO.description: Get Low byte of register and load into D

PHI.description: Put D into High byte of register

PLO.description: Put D into Low byte of register

IDL.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

SAV.description: Save T to memory location in X

MARK.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

RET.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

DIS.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

BR.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

BQ.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

BZ.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

BDF.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

B1.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

B2.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

B3.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

B4.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

SKP.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

BNQ.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

BNZ.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

BNF.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

BN1.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

BN2.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

BN3.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

BN4.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LBR.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LBQ.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LBZ.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LBDF.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LSNQ.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LSNZ.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LSNF.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LSKP.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LBNQ.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LBNZ.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LBNF.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LSIE.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LSQ.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LSZ.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt

LSDF.description: Idle and wait for DMA or interrupt
